ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:42:10 [Issue ID 4000-109334] urn:comicvine:4000-109334 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:01:16. [Issue ID 89620]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool wakes up and finds out he is dead! But of course, he must cause trouble... Even from the grave.
Deadpool wakes up and discovers he's dead and witnessing his own funeral. Both enemies and friends came to pay their respects; including his on-again, off-again enemy/ally, Bullseye; former love interest, Siryn; and Weasel and Blind Al. Of course, Deadpool being Deadpool, causes trouble, even while dead. He posesses Weasel, who is guiding Al, and leads her into an open grave. He then possess Kid Deadpool, who doodled on his picture in his coffin, and has him pinch Juggernaut, begin an outright brawl. He then goes to the afterlife and, right before he gets busy with Death, is ressurected by T-Ray, who triggers the resurrectionby urinating on Deadpool's grave.
ComicInfo.Title: Funeral for a Freak, Part 1 of 4: 'Nuff Said
